item.title: J.D. add a quote by Beatrice Sparks
item.description: "The complete bottom has fallen out of my life." -- Beatrice Sparks

item.title: J.D. add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: J.D. add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: J.D. add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "I must have my share in the conversation…" -- Jane Austen

item.title: J.D. add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "It may be hard for an egg to turn into a bird: it would be a jolly sight harder for a bird to learn to fly while remaining an egg. We are like eggs at present. And you cannot go on indefinitely being just an ordinary, decent egg. We must be hatched or go bad." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: J.D. add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: J.D. add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "A lady's imagination is very rapid; it jumps from admiration to love, from love to matrimony in a moment." -- Jane Austen

item.title: J.D. add a quote by Eudora Welty
item.description: "All serious daring starts from within." -- Eudora Welty

item.title: J.D. add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: J.D. add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: J.D. add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!" -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: J.D. add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Peace begins with a smile.." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: J.D. add a quote by Erma Bombeck
item.description: "When I stand before God at the end of my life, I would hope that I would not have a single bit of talent left, and could say, 'I used everything you gave me." -- Erma Bombeck

item.title: J.D. add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "Give a girl an education and introduce her properly into the world, and ten to one but she has the means of settling well, without further expense to anybody. " -- Jane Austen

item.title: J.D. add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: J.D. add a quote by Norman Vincent Peale
item.description: "Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars." -- Norman Vincent Peale

item.title: J.D. add a quote by Sandra Balzo
item.description: "How the hell did I get myself involved with this broad? It’s like I’m Lassie, she’s Timmy, and every day is a new well." -- Sandra Balzo
